Testing FPREM instruction
FPREM computes partial remainder

Test case 1:
Dividend: 10.00000000000000000000 (0x4002a000000000000000)
Divisor: 3.00000000000000000000 (0x4000c000000000000000)
Expected: 1.00000000000000000000 (0x3fff8000000000000000)
Result: 1.00000000000000000000 (0x3fff8000000000000000)
Tag Word:     0x7800
Top: 7
C0: 0, C1: 0, C2: 0, C3: 1
PASS
